name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SupportTheIDF: Turn Your Searches Into Support

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SupportTheIDF is a powerful yet simple Chrome extension that transforms your everyday web searches into contributions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support The IDF is an innovative platform that transforms everyday online searches into meaningful support for the
Israel Defense Forces. By leveraging search monetization, we enable individuals to contribute effortlessly while
conducting their daily online activities. This groundbreaking approach makes it easier than ever for people to make
a tangible impact, helping protect and strengthen the only Jewish state.
Founded in the aftermath of the tragic events of October 7th, Support The IDF was born out of the urgent need to
provide aid and resources for Israel’s security and resilience. The initiative reﬂects a collective determination to safe-
guard the nation and ensure its future in the face of adversity. Through our platform, every search helps provide
critical support to the brave men and women defending the homeland.
At Support The IDF, we are committed to uniting global communities behind a common cause. Our mission is to
empower supporters around the world with a simple, accessible, and impactful way to contribute. Together, we
stand with the IDF, strengthening its ability to protect, serve, and secure Israel’s future.
